text: Heather Michele O'Rourke (December 27, 1975 February 1, 1988) was an American movie child actress who acted in the movie Poltergeist (1982). She also worked in television. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from sepsis Category:Actors from San Diego Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Disease-related deaths in San Diego County
title: Heather O'Rourke
